code: @Manual{,   title = {condensr: Academic Group Website Generator},   author = {Michael Lydeamore},   year = {2023},   note = {R package version 0.0.1},   url = {http://www.michaellydeamore.com/condensr/}, }

title: Academic Group Website Generator
text: condensr provides easy use, fast framework generating academic “group” websites. Often, consortiums researchers wanting web presence groups staff projects publications, managing website can expensive endeavour. Fundamentally, condensr bunch quarto templates, combined convenience functions generate markdown automatically. Staff linked projects, publications, websites generated automatically.

title: Academic Group Website Generator
text: can install development version condensr GitHub :

title: Academic Group Website Generator
text: get started condensr, simply run: new website generated files need. .qmd page includes high level information. group information belongs index.Rmd three structures expected condensr built. build website, simply run: can host page just like quarto site: GitHub Pages, Netlify, HTML hosting site choosing.

what: Create a quarto file for a specific staff member — create_staff_member_page
title: Create a quarto file for a specific staff member — create_staff_member_page
text: Creates quarto file given input staff member.

title: Create a quarto file for a specific staff member — create_staff_member_page
Create a quarto file for a specific staff member — create_staff_member_page
text: staff_member object class staff_member used generate template. site_dir Directory website. staff_folder Subfolder staff qmd files stored. Default "staff". Note template index.qmd facilitate pretty link formatting -browser.

what: Create the templates for a condensr website — create_website

text: Creates necessary directories, high level files structures condensr website.

title: Create the templates for a condensr website — create_website
Create the templates for a condensr website — create_website
text: dir Target directory website. title Title website.

title: Create the templates for a condensr website — create_website
text: hood, function creating distill website (using distill:::do_create_website), overwriting files condensr specifics. specific files : _site.yml index.Rmd staff_list.Rmd staff_member.Rmd

title: Create the templates for a condensr website — create_website
code: create_website(dir = tempdir(), "test_site") #> Warning: '/var/folders/bl/50qwpc0n15517355znb7_srnfcm2zk/T//RtmpdAKUoS' already exists #> Warning: '/var/folders/bl/50qwpc0n15517355znb7_srnfcm2zk/T//RtmpdAKUoS/staff' already exists #> Creating /var/folders/bl/50qwpc0n15517355znb7_srnfcm2zk/T//RtmpdAKUoS/_quarto.yml #> Creating /var/folders/bl/50qwpc0n15517355znb7_srnfcm2zk/T//RtmpdAKUoS/staff_list.R #> Creating /var/folders/bl/50qwpc0n15517355znb7_srnfcm2zk/T//RtmpdAKUoS/index.qmd #> Creating /var/folders/bl/50qwpc0n15517355znb7_srnfcm2zk/T//RtmpdAKUoS/people/index.qmd #> Creating /var/folders/bl/50qwpc0n15517355znb7_srnfcm2zk/T//RtmpdAKUoS/staff/joe-bloggs/index.qmd

title: Generate Academic Project — project
text: Generates academic project listed staff profiles

title: Generate Academic Project — project
text: id character string uniquely identifies project. name Human readable name project. related_staff Vector ids staff members. Projects listed staff pages vector link URL project. Default NA page link .

title: Generate Academic Project — project
text: object class project containing input information.

title: Generate Academic Project — project
code: example_project <- project(        id = "joes-model",        name = "Joe's Blogging Model",        related_staff = "joe-bloggs"    )

title: Generate publication — publication
text: Generates publication object linked staff websites

title: Generate publication — publication
text: title Title publication. related_staff Vector ids related staff. link URL publication linked. citation Text displayed publication. date Date publication. List publications sorted staff pages.

title: Generate publication — publication
text: object class publication 5 elements: title related_staff link citation date

title: Generate publication — publication
code: example_publication <- publication(     title = "Joe's Blogging Paper",     related_staff = c("joe-bloggs"),     link = NA,     citation = "Bloggs, J., Bloggy, Y. (2019),          The power of blogging, Australian Journal of Bloggs, 43: 149-155.",     date = as.Date("2019-01-01") )

what: Copy Rmd template to target path — render_template
title: Copy Rmd template to target path — render_template
text: Copies file rmarkdown/templates folder target path

title: Copy Rmd template to target path — render_template
code: render_template(   file,   template_folder,   target_path,   output_name = NA,   data = list() )

title: Copy Rmd template to target path — render_template
text: file File name copy. template_folder Folder name file. target_path Path copy . output_name Name copies file. NA, name input file name. data List additional metadata. Must least element name title.

title: Create staff member — staff_member
text: Creates staff member use academic group website. list staff members (default staff_list.Rmd), name description reported. addition, image, stored images/staff filename id.png shown.

title: Create staff member — staff_member
code: staff_member(   id,   name,   description,   external_link,   internal_link = FALSE,   email = NA )

title: Create staff member — staff_member
text: id String defining unique identifier staff member. name Display name staff member. description Short description, used staff pages. external_link Link external website. internal_link internal link used? TRUE/FALSE email email address staff member. Used pre-fill templates.

title: Create staff member — staff_member
text: object class staff_member following elements: id name description external_link internal_link email

title: Create staff member — staff_member
text: external link link "" button rendered website.

title: Create staff member — staff_member
code: example_staff_member <- staff_member(      id = "example-id",      name = "Example Name",      description = "Example description for example staff member.",      external_link = "http://www.example.com/",      internal_link = FALSE  )
